page.title: 15AT LEISURE IN BUTTERLEIGH
page.content: We set out a questionnaire for the people of Butterleigh to find out what they like doing in their spare time and also what facilities they would like to see in the area.Most people do sewing,knitting,watching T.V,and gardening and nearly all like walking. Some people would like more facilities like a swimming pool with cafeteria,something for the young generation and a playing field. Some people would like Butterleigh to stay as it is. There is a Youth Club which meets in the Village hall and members come from Butterleigh and from Tiverton. There are also Whist Drives from time to time in the winter held in the Village hall which are really a social event.
